The quality of this video encode is awful.  This bitrate would be shabby for 480p SD material, never mind 720p HD.  There's macroblocking all over the place along with a slew of other blatantly obvious compression artifacts.  It completely defeats the benefit of a higher resolution when you starve the bitrate in this manner.  Thanks for the upload, but seriously consider using higher bitrates in the future, especially with movies that are 2 Â˝ hours long like this one.
